short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that makes use of ChatGPT's intelligence for filling job applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension, "EZ Apply" utilises the power of the ChatGPT API to assist users in efficiently completing forms. 
With the extension, users have access to the following features: 

- Generating Responses: The extension offers a convenient feature for generating personalised responses to questions on job application forms. By simply highlighting the question with your mouse, right-clicking, and selecting "Get a response" from the “EZ Apply with ChatGPT” option  the extension utilises the ChatGPT API to generate a response tailored to the profile of the user. This generated response is automatically copied to your clipboard, allowing you to easily paste it into the appropriate text box. 

- Paraphrasing: The paraphrasing feature utilises the ChatGPT API to rephrase text written by the user. This can be useful when a candidate wants to convey their ideas in a different way. To use this feature, simply highlight the desired text, right-click, and select the "Paraphrase" feature from the “EZ Apply with ChatGPT” option. The rephrased text will automatically replace the original text in the text box.

Creators:
- Faizan Shaikh (https://www.linkedin.com/in/faizanshaikh17/)
- Rahul Pillai (https://linkedin.com/in/thegeekylad)

The project is open source and can be found at: https://github.com/faizan171997/ez-apply-extension.
